title: create array to pass to changeIt method

content.prompt:
Consider the following method.

public void changeIt(int[] arr, int index, int newValue)

{

arr[index] += newValue;

}

Which of the following code segments, if located in a method in the same class as changeIt, will cause the array myArray to contain {0, 5, 0, 0} ?

choices.label:
int[] myArray = new int[4];

changeIt(myArray, 1, 5);

int[] myArray = new int[4];

changeIt(myArray, 2, 5);

int[] myArray = new int[5];

changeIt(myArray, 1, 4);

int[] myArray = new int[5];

changeIt(myArray, 1, 5);

topic.text: 3.6: Methods: Passing and Returning References of an Object

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
